articles.title: Inside Iran, panic as strikes hit but for some it's a moment of relief
articles.description: Iranians talk about what is happening inside the country, despite an almost total internet blackout.

articles.summary: イラン国内で攻撃が発生し、インターネットがほぼ遮断される中、国民はパニックに陥る一方で一部には安堵が広まっている。

articles.title: Luxury Dubai hotel hit as Iran launches retaliatory strikes across region
articles.description: Smoke and flames rose from Dubai's Fairmont The Palm hotel as civilian targets came under fire along with the US military bases across the middle east.
articles.titleJa: イランが地域全体に報復攻撃、ドバイの高級ホテルも標的に
articles.summary: イランが中東全域で報復攻撃を開始し、米軍基地に加えドバイの高級ホテル「フェアモント・ザ・パーム」も民間標的として被弾、炎と煙が上がった。

articles.title: At least 20 killed after military plane carrying banknotes crashes in Bolivia
articles.description: Police fire tear gas to disperse crowds allegedly trying to take banknotes from the crash site.
articles.titleJa: ボリビアで紙幣を運ぶ軍用機が墜落、少なくとも20人死亡

articles.title: Bill Clinton asked about hot tub photo and testifies he knew 'nothing' of Epstein crimes
articles.description: The former president told the committee that he would never have flown on Epstein's plane if he "had any inkling of what he was doing".
articles.titleJa: ビル・クリントン、温水浴槽の写真について質問され、エプスタインの犯罪は「何も知らなかった」と証言
articles.summary: ビル・クリントン元大統領は、温水浴槽の写真について尋問を受け、エプスタインの犯罪については「何も知らなかった」と証言し、もし知っていたら彼の飛行機には決して乗らなかったと述べた。

articles.title: A 'delicate' balance for Canada and a 'win-win' for Modi as Carney visits India

articles.title: Trump orders government to stop using Anthropic in battle over AI use

articles.title: DOJ charges 30 more people in Minnesota anti-ICE church protest

articles.titleJa: DOJ、ミネソタ州の反ICE教会抗議デモでさらに30人を起訴
articles.summary: 米司法省は、ミネソタ州で発生した反ICE（移民税関執行局）教会抗議デモに関連して、さらに30人を起訴した。元CNNアンカーのドン・レモン氏も、先月逮捕された最初の9人の被告の一人だった。

articles.title: Tram derails in Milan, leaving two dead and dozens injured
articles.description: The crowded tram was travelling in the centre of Milan at rush hour when it appeared to crash into the side of a building.

articles.summary: ミラノ中心部のラッシュアワーに満員の路面電車が脱線し、建物側面に衝突したとみられ、2人が死亡し数十人が負傷した。

articles.title: Pakistan defence minister says country in 'open war' with Afghanistan after strikes
articles.description: The latest attacks by Pakistan follow months of clashes between the two countries. despite agreeing to a fragile ceasefire in October.
articles.titleJa: パキスタン国防相、攻撃後にアフガニスタンと「全面戦争」状態にあると表明
articles.summary: パキスタン国防相は、パキスタンによる最新の攻撃を受けて、国がアフガニスタンと「全面戦争」状態にあると表明した。この攻撃は、10月に脆弱な停戦に合意したにもかかわらず、両国間の数か月にわたる衝突に続くものだ。

articles.title: Why did diplomacy fail between the US and Iran?
articles.description: Talks in Geneva went well, participants said. But hours later, the US and Israel attacked Iran. Were diplomatic efforts just a ruse?

articles.summary: ジュネーブでの交渉後、米国とイスラエルがイランを攻撃。外交努力が欺瞞だったのかを問う。

articles.title: Donald Trump's Iran objectives: What can be achieved?
articles.description: The US has launched "major combat operations" against Iran, with President Donald Trump delineating his military objectives in a speech. DW asked some analysts whether these targets can be achieved.
articles.titleJa: ドナルド・トランプのイランに対する目標：何が達成できるのか？
articles.summary: 米国がイランに対し「大規模な戦闘作戦」を開始。トランプ大統領が軍事目標を表明し、その達成可能性が問われている。

articles.title: Pakistan says hundreds of Afghan Taliban fighters killed
articles.description: More than 300 Afghan Taliban fighters were killed in the latest airstrikes and border clashes, according to Pakistan officials. Meanwhile, the Taliban claimed to have shot down a Pakistani jet.
articles.titleJa: パキスタン、数百人のアフガン・タリバン戦闘員を殺害と発表
articles.summary: パキスタン当局は空爆と国境衝突で300人以上のアフガン・タリバン戦闘員が死亡したと発表。タリバンはパキスタン機撃墜を主張。

articles.description: Iceland is a close partner of the EU but not a full member. That could change if Icelanders vote to join the bloc. As ties with the US deteriorate, the government could bring forward a referendum on the issue.

articles.title: Strikes on Iran renew fears over Strait of Hormuz
articles.description: US President Trump has carried out his threat to attack Iran, shifting attention to the Strait of Hormuz, the world's most critical oil chokepoint. Iran has repeatedly threatened to block the vital waterway.

articles.description: A blockade on oil imports is leaving Cuba with few resources. US Secretary of State Marco Rubio wants Cuba's government on its knees. The situation has become even more tense following a fatal confrontation at sea.

articles.title: Lebanon on edge as US and Israel launch attack on Iran
articles.description: While Lebanon's government opposes getting involved, Hezbollah has said it would view an attack on Iran's leader as a "red line." Israel has previously warned Beirut of heavy strikes.

articles.summary: テヘランへの攻撃後、ネタニヤフ首相はハメネイ師の死亡を示唆。米国防総省は、イランの報復攻撃を撃退し、米軍に死傷者なしと発表。

articles.title: Ghana says at least 55 of its people killed after Russia ‘lured’ them to fight Ukraine
articles.description:
Foreign minister says 272 Ghanaians are thought to have been drawn into battle since 2022, after he visited Kyiv
At least 55 Ghanaians have been killed in Russia’s war with Ukraine after being “lured into battle”, Ghana’s foreign minister has said after a visit to Kyiv in which officials raised the issue of Russian recruitment of African people.
Reports of African men being attracted to Russia by promises of jobs and ending up on Ukraine’s frontlines have become more frequent in recent months, creating tensions between Moscow and some of the countries involved.
 Continue reading...
articles.titleJa: ガーナ、ロシアが「誘い込み」ウクライナで戦闘後、少なくとも55人が死亡と発表
articles.summary: ガーナ外相は、ロシアがウクライナ戦争へガーナ国民を勧誘し、少なくとも55人が死亡したと発表。アフリカ人男性のロシアによる徴用が問題視されている。

articles.title: Rising anger over ‘lop-sided’ and ‘immoral’ US health funding pacts with African countries
articles.description:
Zimbabwe refuses to sign agreement and Kenya faces a court case over data sharing as new aid deals come under scrutiny
A series of bilateral health agreements being negotiated between African countries and the administration of President Donald Trump have been labelled “clearly lop-sided” and “immoral” amid growing outrage at US demands, including countries being forced to share biological resources and data.
It emerged this week that Zimbabwe had halted negotiations with the US for $350m (£258m) of health funding, saying the proposals risked undermining its sovereignty and independence.
 Continue reading...
articles.titleJa: アフリカ諸国との「不公平」で「不道徳」な米国医療資金協定に対する怒りの高まり
articles.summary: 米国とアフリカ諸国間の医療資金協定が「不公平」で「不道徳」と批判され、ジンバブエは署名を拒否。ケニアもデータ共有で訴訟に直面している。

articles.title: Two women arrested in Uganda for allegedly kissing in public could face life sentence
articles.description:
Wendy Faith and Alesi Diana Denise were taken into custody under laws that have outraged LGBTQ+ community and rights activists
Two women have been arrested and detained in Uganda after allegedly kissing in public, an act of “same-sex activity” which can lead to a life sentence in the east African country..
Wendy Faith, a 22-year-old musician known as Torrero Bae, and Alesi Diana Denise, 21, were taken into custody after police raided their rented room in Uganda’s north-west Arua City last week.
 Continue reading...
articles.titleJa: ウガンダで公衆の面前でキスしたとされる女性2人が逮捕、終身刑の可能性も
articles.summary: ウガンダで公衆の面前でキスをしたとして女性2人が逮捕され、同国では同性愛行為により終身刑が科される可能性があり、人権活動家から怒りの声が上がっている。

articles.title: ‘A devastating force’: how recent storms turned to tragedies across the western Mediterranean
articles.description:
Atmospheric machine-gun has fired storm after deadly storm at the region this year, leaving a trail of widespread destruction
For Andrés Sánchez Barea, in Spain, it was the fear that arose when water started to spurt from plug sockets. For Nelson Duarte, in Portugal, it was the helplessness that hit as violent winds smacked down trees and tore tiles from roofs. For Amal Essuide, in Morocco, it was the reality that dawned when a corpse was pulled onboard a boat in the flooded medina.
Each moment of horror is a fragment of the destruction wrought by an atmospheric machine-gun that in recent weeks has fired storm after storm at the western Mediterranean. Scientists do not know if climate breakdown helped pull the trigger, but research suggests it loaded the chamber with bigger bullets.
 Continue reading...
articles.titleJa: 「破壊的な力」：最近の嵐が西地中海全域で悲劇へと化した経緯
articles.summary: 最近、西地中海地域を襲った連続する嵐が、スペイン、ポルトガル、モロッコなどで広範な破壊と悲劇をもたらした。科学者は気候変動との関連を指摘している。

articles.title: US accused of ‘shameless exploitation’ over proposed Zambian health aid deal
articles.description:
Leaked draft of $1bn memorandum of understanding reveals mandatory targets, sharing of data, and reported access to mining concessions
The US has been accused of “shameless exploitation” over a health financing agreement with Zambia worth more than $1bn (£740m), amid warnings that the country is getting a raw deal from the Trump administration.
A leaked draft of a five-year memorandum of understanding (MOU) between the two countries, seen by the Guardian, reveals that Zambia may accept terms worse than health financing agreements the US has reached with 16 other African countries.
 Continue reading...
articles.titleJa: 米国、ザンビアへの保健援助取引案で「恥知らずな搾取」と非難される
articles.summary: 米国がザンビアとの10億ドル規模の保健援助協定案を巡り、「恥知らずな搾取」と非難されている。草案にはデータ共有や鉱山採掘権へのアクセスが盛り込まれている。

articles.title: ‘Adventurism has had its day’: speedboat shootout leaves Miami’s exiled Cubans bewildered
articles.description:
Few clues as to how 10 heavily armed men intercepted on stolen speedboat came together from across Florida or what they hoped to achieve 
Foot traffic was slow outside the Bay of Pigs Museum on Calle Ocho in Miami’s Little Havana neighbourhood. A few tourists in T-shirts and shorts bypassed the gallery dedicated to one of the most fateful days in Cuba’s history and headed instead to nearby Máximo Gómez Park to take photographs of Cuban exiles playing dominoes.
This is the street at the heart of the Cuban expat community of more than 1 million people where tens of thousands partied through the night in November 2016 to celebrate the death of Fidel Castro, and where they gathered in sorrow almost exactly 30 years ago to mourn four Cuban-Americans shot down by the communist country’s air force as they conducted a mission for the humanitarian exile group Brothers to the Rescue.
 Continue reading...
articles.titleJa: 「冒険主義は過去のもの」：高速ボート銃撃戦がマイアミの亡命キューバ人を困惑させる
articles.summary: マイアミで10人の武装集団が高速ボートで拿捕される銃撃戦が発生し、亡命キューバ人社会に困惑が広がっている。彼らの目的は不明だが、政治的背景が存在する。

articles.title: At least 20 killed as cash-laden military cargo plane crashes in Bolivia
articles.description:
Riot police use teargas to disperse people gathering around wreckage of plane loaded with money from central bank
At least 20 people have died and dozens have been injured after a military cargo plane carrying banknotes crashed while landing near Bolivia’s capital on Friday, damaging about a dozen vehicles on a highway and scattering bills on the ground, an official has said.
Footage from local media showed people rushing to collect banknotes while police in riot gear tried to disperse them using teargas. Authorities were later seen setting the money alight in a bonfire at the scene of the crash.
 Continue reading...
articles.titleJa: 現金積載の軍用輸送機がボリビアで墜落、少なくとも20人死亡

articles.title: Trump suggests US could carry out ‘friendly takeover’ of Cuba
articles.description:
As tensions between two countries reach new highs, US president says regime is ‘talking with us’
Donald Trump has suggested the US could carry out a “friendly takeover” of Cuba as tensions between Washington and Havana reach a new high after the capture of Venezuela’s Nicolás Maduro.
As he left the White House for a campaigning event in Texas on Friday, Trump said: “The Cuban government is talking with us. They’re in a big deal of trouble.”
 Continue reading...
articles.titleJa: トランプ氏、米国がキューバを「友好的に引き継ぐ」可能性を示唆
articles.summary: トランプ大統領が、米国とキューバ間の緊張が高まる中、米国がキューバを「友好的に引き継ぐ」可能性を示唆した。キューバ政府が米国と協議しているとの発言もあった。

articles.title: Democrats outraged at US military’s downing of CBP drone near Mexico border
articles.description:
Second time in two weeks military used laser to attack what it mistakenly thought was a threat, disrupting air traffic

Sign up for the Breaking News US email to get newsletter alerts in your inbox

Democratic members of Congress have expressed astonishment and anger at what they claim is the incompetence of the Trump administration after the US military used a laser on Thursday to shoot down what it thought was a threatening drone on the US-Mexico border in Texas but later turned out to belong to US Customs and Border Protection (CBP).
The apparent confusion between two entities in the US government led to airspace being closed around Fort Hancock, right along the border. It was the second time in two weeks that air traffic was disrupted in the region as a result of a high-energy laser being deployed against drones.
 Continue reading...
articles.titleJa: 米国軍によるメキシコ国境付近でのCBPドローン撃墜に民主党が激怒
articles.summary: 米国軍がメキシコ国境付近で誤って米国税関・国境警備局（CBP）のドローンをレーザーで撃墜し、民主党議員からトランプ政権の無能さに怒りの声が上がっている。

articles.title: ‘More exploitation, fewer rights’: Argentina braces for sweeping overhaul of labor laws
articles.description:
Javier Milei’s boosters say law will revive employment, but critics decry cuts to severance and longer working hours
Argentina’s senate is poised to approve a sweeping overhaul of labour laws aimed at weakening trade unions and lowering labour costs for businesses.
The government of the self-styled “anarcho-capitalist” president, Javier Milei, says the initiative will help revive formal employment, after 290,600 registered jobs were lost between December 2023, when he took office, and November 2025.
 Continue reading...
articles.titleJa: 「さらなる搾取、より少ない権利」：アルゼンチン、労働法の大幅改正に備える
articles.summary: アルゼンチンが労働法の大幅な改正を控えており、政府は雇用回復を期待する一方、批判派は退職金削減や労働時間延長による労働者の権利侵害を懸念している。

articles.title: Threat of further violence looms after Mexican cartel rampage
articles.description: The BBC speaks to Guadalajara residents days after cartel members sought to avenge the killing of Nemesio "El Mencho" Oseguera.
articles.titleJa: メキシコカルテルの暴動後、さらなる暴力の脅威が迫る
articles.summary: カルテル幹部「エル・メンチョ」殺害への報復を求めるカルテルメンバーの暴動後、グアダラハラ住民がさらなる暴力の脅威に直面しているとBBCが伝える。

articles.title: Who was El Mencho, Mexico's most wanted man?
articles.description: The BBC's Will Grant examines the power wielded by the Jalisco drug cartel chief, who died after a clash with security forces assisted by US intelligence.
articles.titleJa: メキシコ最重要指名手配犯「エル・メンチョ」とは何者だったのか？
articles.summary: 米情報機関の支援を受けた治安部隊との衝突で死亡したハリスコ麻薬カルテル幹部「エル・メンチョ」の権力と人物像をBBCが解説。

articles.title: 'Burned and destroyed': Locals and tourists describe Mexico unrest
articles.description: Violence has erupted across several states in Mexico after cartel leader El Mencho was killed on Sunday.
articles.titleJa: 「焼かれ、破壊された」：メキシコ暴動を地元住民と観光客が語る
articles.summary: カルテル幹部エル・メンチョ殺害後、メキシコの複数の州で暴力が勃発。地元住民や観光客がその状況を証言。

articles.title: How the series ‘The Eternaut’ revived searches for the disappeared in Argentina
articles.description: The family of Héctor Germán Oesterheld, author of the comic strip behind the series, lost nine members to the dictatorship: Oesterheld himself, his four daughters, two sons-in-law and two grandchildren.
articles.titleJa: シリーズ『エテルナウト』がアルゼンチンにおける行方不明者の捜索をいかに再活性化させたか
articles.summary: アルゼンチンの漫画シリーズ『エテルナウト』が、過去の独裁政権下で強制失踪させられた人々の捜索活動を再び活発化させている。

articles.title: After alleged racist insult, an Argentine tourist faces the possibility of prison time in Brazil
articles.description: Many people on social media reacted with surprise to the story of the Argentine visitor arrested for allegedly making racial insults. Racism is a non-bailable offense in Brazil.
articles.titleJa: 人種差別発言疑惑後、アルゼンチン人観光客がブラジルで実刑判決の可能性に直面
articles.summary: ブラジルで人種差別発言の疑いをかけられたアルゼンチン人観光客が逮捕され、保釈不可能な罪として実刑判決の可能性に直面している。

articles.title: Wasting renewable energy comes at a high cost for the Dominican Republic
articles.description: By operating thermal plants above their limits and maintaining a grid with insufficient storage capacity, the DR wastes part of its clean energy and generates multimillion-dollar losses.
articles.titleJa: ドミニカ共和国にとって再生可能エネルギーの無駄は高コストにつながる
articles.summary: ドミニカ共和国は、再生可能エネルギーを無駄にし、多額の損失を抱えている。これは、火力発電所の過剰稼働と蓄電容量不足が原因である。

articles.title: Venezuela inflates release figures as political prisoners remain in limbo
articles.description: As Venezuelan authorities claim a mass release of political prisoners, families wait outside detention centers without answers, or guarantees. Behind the government’s discourse of reconciliation, uncertainty and fear persist.
articles.titleJa: 政治犯が宙に浮いたまま、ベネズエラが釈放者数を水増し
articles.summary: ベネズエラ政府は政治犯の大量釈放を主張するが、家族は情報もなく、不確実性と恐怖が残る。

articles.title: The peacemakers: Meet Venezuelans who are fighting to free political detainees
articles.description: In Venezuela, relatives and human-rights NGOs have stepped up calls for the immediate release of more than 800 victims of politically-motivated persecution of the government formerly led by Nicolás Maduro.
articles.titleJa: 平和の担い手：政治犯の解放のために闘うベネズエラ人たち
articles.summary: ベネズエラでは、ニコラス・マドゥロ政権下での政治的迫害を受けた800人以上の人々の解放を求め、家族や人権NGOが活動を強化している。

articles.title: Venezuela after Maduro: Leadership of the South American nation seems uncertain
articles.description: Since the airstrikes, there has been a huge sense of uncertainty, with long queues in local supermarkets and gas stations, and Caracas residents worried about basic necessities like groceries.
articles.titleJa: マドゥロ後のベネズエラ：この南米国家のリーダーシップは不確実
articles.summary: 空爆以来、ベネズエラはリーダーシップの不確実性に覆われ、市民は食料品などの基本的な必需品に不安を抱いている。

articles.title: A new, terrifying sound: A Venezuelan account of the the attack on Caracas
articles.description: “I thought Venezuelans had already heard every sound the country’s violence had to offer. But this was something new — terrifying in its unfamiliarity.”
articles.titleJa: 新たな、恐ろしい音：カラカス攻撃に関するベネズエラ人の証言
articles.summary: ベネズエラのカラカスで発生した攻撃について、住民が「これまで経験したことのない恐ろしい音」と表現し、その暴力性を語る。

articles.title: ‘Clean up your culture’: a TV host’s comment makes Indigenous Brazilians speak up
articles.description: “Access to technology should be a guaranteed right to the all Brazilian citizens. To have a cell phone doesn't make (anyone) less Indigenous.”
articles.titleJa: 「あなたの文化をきれいにしろ」：テレビ司会者の発言がブラジルの先住民を立ち上がらせる
articles.summary: テレビ司会者の発言がブラジルの先住民の反発を招き、彼らは技術へのアクセスは権利であり、携帯電話を持つことが先住民性を損なうものではないと主張している。

articles.title: Dominican Republic wastes renewable energy while fossil fuel thermoelectric plants operate above legal limits
articles.description: Non-compliance with Technical Minimum Power, causing a greater injection of fossil-fuel-generated energy into the grid, violates Dominican legislation and hinders climate commitments, especially when renewable energy companies’ production remains restricted.
articles.titleJa: ドミニカ共和国、化石燃料火力発電所が法的制限を超えて稼働する一方で再生可能エネルギーを浪費
articles.summary: ドミニカ共和国は、法的制限を超えて稼働する化石燃料火力発電所がある一方、再生可能エネルギーを浪費し、気候変動対策を妨げている。

articles.title: Social networks fuel youth mobilization on Argentina’s streets
articles.description: Unlike movements in earlier decades, Argentina’s latest youth-led protests are increasingly organized digitally through platforms like TikTok, Instagram, and Whatsapp, rather than through unions or political parties.
articles.titleJa: ソーシャルネットワークがアルゼンチンの若者のデモ活動を活性化
articles.summary: アルゼンチンで、若者主導の抗議活動がTikTokやInstagramなどのソーシャルネットワークを通じて組織され、デモ活動が活発化している。

articles.title: These filmmakers know exactly how to get you hooked on bizarre one-minute dramas
articles.description: The business depends on packing a punch right away because the first five to 10 episodes are free.
articles.titleJa: これらの映画製作者は、奇妙な1分ドラマに人々を夢中にさせる方法を正確に知っている
articles.summary: 最初の数エピソードが無料であるため、すぐにインパクトを与えることがビジネスの鍵となる短編ドラマの製作方法について。

articles.title: What we know after latest escalation in Pakistan-Afghanistan tensions
articles.description: Bombings by Pakistan are the most significant development in tensions between the two neighbours - though the physical impact remains unclear.
articles.titleJa: パキスタンとアフガニスタンの緊張最新激化後、我々が知っていること
articles.summary: パキスタンによる爆撃は、両国間の緊張において最も重要な進展だが、物理的な影響はまだ不明である。

articles.title: Why are Afghanistan and Pakistan fighting?
articles.description: The two sides have different versions of how and why the deadly dispute began.
articles.titleJa: なぜアフガニスタンとパキスタンは争っているのか？
articles.summary: 両国は、この致命的な紛争がどのように、なぜ始まったのかについて異なる見解を持っている。

articles.title: The Boys' Love at the heart of Heated Rivalry is a familiar tale in Asia
articles.description: Same-sex romance has flourished in Asia as a haven of fantasy and escapism for women and the queer community.
articles.titleJa: 「ヒートライバルリー」の中心にあるボーイズラブは、アジアではおなじみの物語である
articles.summary: 同性愛のロマンスは、女性やクィアコミュニティにとってファンタジーと逃避の場として、アジアで繁栄してきた。

articles.title: India and Israel pledge to boost ties in defence and technology
articles.description: Opposition parties have criticised Modi's visit and accused the government of abandoning the Palestinian cause.
articles.titleJa: インドとイスラエル、防衛・技術分野での関係強化を誓約
articles.summary: インドとイスラエルは防衛と技術分野での関係強化を誓約したが、野党はモディ首相の訪問を批判し、パレスチナ問題の放棄だと非難した。

articles.title: 'Shirtless' protest at AI summit sparks political storm in India
articles.description: Eight members of the youth wing of India's Congress party have been arrested in connection with the protests.
articles.titleJa: AIサミットでの「上半身裸」の抗議がインドで政治的嵐を巻き起こす
articles.summary: インドのAIサミットで「上半身裸」の抗議が行われ、コングレス党青年部のメンバー8人が逮捕され、政治的な波紋を呼んでいる。

articles.title: Dyson settles forced labour suit in landmark UK case
articles.description: Migrant workers alleged they were subjected to abusive treatment in a Malaysian factory for Dyson.
articles.titleJa: ダイソン、英国の画期的な訴訟で強制労働問題を和解
articles.summary: ダイソンは英国での画期的な訴訟において、マレーシアの工場での強制労働疑惑に関する問題を和解した。

articles.title: Hong Kong jailed my dad to stop me speaking out, says activist
articles.description: Pro-democracy activist Anna Kwok's father has been jailed for eight months for a national security offence.
articles.titleJa: 香港が私の発言を止めるため父を投獄した、と活動家が語る
articles.summary: 民主活動家アンナ・クォックの父親が国家安全法違反で香港で8ヶ月の刑に処され、彼女は自身の活動を抑圧するためのものだと訴えている。

articles.title: Australian comedian Magda Szubanski in remission from cancer
articles.description: The actress announced last year that she was undergoing treatment for a rare and aggressive cancer.
articles.titleJa: オーストラリアのコメディアン、マグダ・ズバンスキーが癌から寛解
articles.summary: オーストラリアのコメディアン兼女優マグダ・ズバンスキーが、昨年発表した希少ながんの治療を経て、寛解したことを発表した。

articles.title: China removes nine military officials ahead of key political meeting
articles.description: No official reason for the removal was given, but it comes ahead of the country's key Two Sessions meeting.
articles.titleJa: 中国、主要政治会議を前に軍高官9人を解任
articles.summary: 中国は主要な「両会」を前に軍高官9人を解任したが、公式な理由は公表されていない。これは国内の重要な政治動向を示唆している。
